ITEM.NAME: EMBEDDED
ITEM.NOT_SHOW_IF: (HIVE_VERSION=='APACHE_0_20_203' OR HIVE_VERSION=='MAPR1' OR HIVE_VERSION=='MapR_EMR' OR HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH3') AND DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM'

ITEM.NAME: STANDALONE
ITEM.NOT_SHOW_IF: (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_0' OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_2' AND HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_3' AND HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_0' AND HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_1' AND HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_2' AND HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE')) AND (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM')

PARAMETER.NAME: HIVE_SERVER
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM') OR ((HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_2') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_3') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_0') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_1') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_2') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0') OR ((DISTRIBUTION=='CLOUDERA') AND (HIVE_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH3')) OR (HIVE_VERSION=='MAPR213') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='MAPR301') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='MAPR310') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='MAPR401')))

PARAMETER.NAME: USE_KRB
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM') OR ((HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_0') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_2') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_3') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_0') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_1') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_2') OR ((((DISTRIBUTION=='CLOUDERA') AND (HIVE_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH3')) OR HIVE_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0') AND ((HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE' AND CONNECTION_MODE=='EMBEDDED') OR HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE2'))))

PARAMETER.NAME: JOBTRACKER_PRINCIPAL
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND (USE_KRB=='true') AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM' AND USE_YARN=='false') OR ((HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_0') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_2') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_3') OR ((HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4' OR HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH5_1_MR1') AND ((HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE' AND CONNECTION_MODE=='EMBEDDED') OR HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE2'))))

PARAMETER.NAME: RESOURCEMANAGER_PRINCIPAL
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND (USE_KRB=='true') AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM' AND USE_YARN=='true') OR ((HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_0') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_1') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_2') OR ((((DISTRIBUTION=='CLOUDERA') AND (HIVE_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH3') AND (HIVE_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH4') AND (HIVE_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH5_1_MR1')) OR HIVE_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0') AND ((HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE' AND CONNECTION_MODE=='EMBEDDED') OR HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE2'))))

PARAMETER.NAME: USE_SSL
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE2') AND (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM') OR ((HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_0') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_1') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_2') OR ((((DISTRIBUTION=='CLOUDERA') AND (HIVE_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH3')) OR HIVE_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0'))))

PARAMETER.NAME: SET_MAPRED_JT
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND DISTRIBUTION!='MICROSOFT_HD_INSIGHT' AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM' AND USE_YARN=='false') OR (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND HIVE_VERSION!='PIVOTAL_HD_1_0_1' AND HIVE_VERSION!='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0' AND HIVE_VERSION!='HDP_2_0' AND HIVE_VERSION!='HDP_2_1' AND HIVE_VERSION!='HDP_2_2' AND ((DISTRIBUTION!='CLOUDERA') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH3') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH5_1_MR1')) AND HIVE_VERSION!='MAPR401' AND HIVE_VERSION!='APACHE_2_4_0_EMR'))

PARAMETER.NAME: SET_RESOURCE_MANAGER
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM' AND USE_YARN=='true') OR (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND (HIVE_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_1_0_1' OR HIVE_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0' OR HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_0' OR HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_1' OR HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_2' OR ((DISTRIBUTION=='CLOUDERA') AND (HIVE_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH3') AND (HIVE_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH4') AND (HIVE_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH5_1_MR1')) OR HIVE_VERSION=='MAPR401' OR HIVE_VERSION=='APACHE_2_4_0_EMR')))

PARAMETER.NAME: PARQUET_NOTE
PARAMETER.DEFAULT: Parquet is only supported if the distribution uses embedded Hive version 0.10 or later.

ITEM.NAME: ORC
ITEM.NOT_SHOW_IF: ((HIVE_VERSION!='HDP_1_3') AND (HIVE_VERSION!='MAPR213') AND (HIVE_VERSION!='HDP_2_0') AND (HIVE_VERSION!='HDP_2_1') AND (HIVE_VERSION!='HDP_2_2') AND (DISTRIBUTION!='MICROSOFT_HD_INSIGHT') AND (HIVE_VERSION!='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0') AND ((DISTRIBUTION!='CLOUDERA') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH3') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4_YARN')) AND (HIVE_VERSION!='MAPR401')) AND (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM')

ITEM.NAME: AVRO
ITEM.SHOW_IF: (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_2') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_3') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_0') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_1') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_2') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0') OR ((DISTRIBUTION=='CLOUDERA') AND (HIVE_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH3')) OR (HIVE_VERSION=='MAPR212') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='MAPR213') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='MAPR401') OR (DISTRIBUTION=='MICROSOFT_HD_INSIGHT') OR (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'true') OR (DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM')

ITEM.NAME: PARQUET
ITEM.SHOW_IF: (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION=='true' OR (DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM' OR (HIVE_VERSION!='APACHE_0_20_203' AND HIVE_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH3' AND HIVE_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH4' AND HIVE_VERSION!='MAPR2' AND HIVE_VERSION!='APACHE_1_0_0' AND HIVE_VERSION!='HDP_1_0' AND HIVE_VERSION!='PIVOTAL_HD_1_0_1')))

PARAMETER.NAME: FIELD_TERMINATED_BY
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (LIKE_TABLE=='false') AND (STORAGE_FORMAT!='STORAGE') AND (SET_SERDE_ROW_FORMAT=='false') AND (SET_ROW_FORMAT=='true') AND (SET_FIELD_TERMINATED_BY=='true') AND (STORAGE_FORMAT!='AVRO') AND (STORAGE_FORMAT!='PARQUET')

PARAMETER.NAME: SET_FIELD_ESCAPE_BY
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (LIKE_TABLE=='false') AND (STORAGE_FORMAT!='STORAGE') AND (SET_SERDE_ROW_FORMAT=='false') AND (SET_ROW_FORMAT=='true') AND (SET_FIELD_TERMINATED_BY=='true') AND (STORAGE_FORMAT!='AVRO') AND (STORAGE_FORMAT!='PARQUET')

PARAMETER.NAME: FIELD_ESCAPE_BY
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (LIKE_TABLE=='false') AND (STORAGE_FORMAT!='STORAGE') AND (SET_SERDE_ROW_FORMAT=='false') AND (SET_ROW_FORMAT=='true') AND (SET_FIELD_TERMINATED_BY=='true') AND (SET_FIELD_ESCAPE_BY=='true') AND (STORAGE_FORMAT!='AVRO') AND (STORAGE_FORMAT!='PARQUET')

PARAMETER.NAME: COLLECTION_ITEM_TERMINATED_BY
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (LIKE_TABLE=='false') AND (STORAGE_FORMAT!='STORAGE') AND (SET_SERDE_ROW_FORMAT=='false') AND (SET_ROW_FORMAT=='true') AND (SET_COLLECTION_ITEM_TERMINATED_BY=='true') AND (STORAGE_FORMAT!='AVRO') AND (STORAGE_FORMAT!='PARQUET')

PARAMETER.NAME: MAP_KEY_TERMINATED_BY
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (LIKE_TABLE=='false') AND (STORAGE_FORMAT!='STORAGE') AND (SET_SERDE_ROW_FORMAT=='false') AND (SET_ROW_FORMAT=='true') AND (SET_MAP_KEY_TERMINATED_BY=='true') AND (STORAGE_FORMAT!='AVRO') AND (STORAGE_FORMAT!='PARQUET')

PARAMETER.NAME: LINES_TERMINATED_BY
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (LIKE_TABLE=='false') AND (STORAGE_FORMAT!='STORAGE') AND (SET_SERDE_ROW_FORMAT=='false') AND (SET_ROW_FORMAT=='true') AND (SET_LINES_TERMINATED_BY=='true') AND (STORAGE_FORMAT!='AVRO') AND (STORAGE_FORMAT!='PARQUET')

PARAMETER.NAME: CLUSTERED_BY_AND_SKEWED_BY
PARAMETER.DEFAULT: "CLUSTERED BY (col_name, col_name, ...) [SORTED BY (col_name [ASC|DESC], ...)] INTO num_buckets BUCKETS] SKEWED BY (col_name, col_name, ...) ON ([(col_value, col_value, ...), ...|col_value, col_value, ...]) "

PARAMETER.NAME: NOTE
PARAMETER.DEFAULT: If you are on Windows, add a '/' in front of the path you type in.

PARAMETER.NAME: SET_MEMORY
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM' AND USE_YARN=='true') OR (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND (HIVE_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_1_0_1' OR HIVE_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0' OR HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_0' OR HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_1' OR HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_2' OR ((DISTRIBUTION=='CLOUDERA') AND (HIVE_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH3') AND (HIVE_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH4') AND (HIVE_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH5_1_MR1')) OR HIVE_VERSION=='MAPR401' OR DISTRIBUTION=='MICROSOFT_HD_INSIGHT')))

IMPORT.NAME: hadoop-conf-kerberos
IMPORT.REQUIRED_IF: (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM') AND (USE_KRB=='true') AND ((HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_0') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_2') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_3') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_0') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_1') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_2') OR ((((DISTRIBUTION=='CLOUDERA') AND (HIVE_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH3')) OR HIVE_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0') AND ((HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE' AND CONNECTION_MODE=='EMBEDDED') OR HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE2')))

IMPORT.NAME: Driver-Hadoop-0.20.203
IMPORT.REQUIRED_IF: (HIVE_VERSION=='APACHE_0_20_203' OR HIVE_VERSION=='MAPR1' OR HIVE_VERSION=='MapR_EMR') and (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM'

IMPORT.REQUIRED_IF: (HIVE_VERSION=='APACHE_0_20_203' OR HIVE_VERSION=='MAPR1' OR HIVE_VERSION=='MapR_EMR' OR HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH3') and (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM'

IMPORT.NAME: antlr-runtime-3.0.1.jar

IMPORT.NAME: jdo2-api-2.3-ec.jar

IMPORT.NAME: jackson-core-asl-1.8.8.jar
IMPORT.REQUIRED_IF: (HIVE_VERSION=='APACHE_1_0_0' OR HIVE_VERSION=='APACHE_1_0_3_EMR' OR HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_0') and (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM'

IMPORT.NAME: jackson-mapper-asl-1.8.8.jar
IMPORT.REQUIRED_IF: (HIVE_VERSION=='APACHE_1_0_0' OR HIVE_VERSION=='APACHE_1_0_3_EMR' OR HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_0') and (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM'

IMPORT.NAME: parquet-hive-bundle-1.5.0
IMPORT.REQUIRED_IF: (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION=='false' AND (STORAGE_FORMAT=='PARQUET') AND DISTRIBUTION!='PIVOTAL_HD' AND DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND HIVE_VERSION!='APACHE_0_20_203' AND HIVE_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH3' AND HIVE_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH4' AND HIVE_VERSION!='MAPR2' AND HIVE_VERSION!='APACHE_1_0_0' AND HIVE_VERSION!='HDP_1_0')

IMPORT.NAME: snappy-java-1.0.5.jar
IMPORT.REQUIRED_IF: (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION=='false' AND (STORAGE_FORMAT=='PARQUET') AND DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND HIVE_VERSION!='APACHE_0_20_203' AND HIVE_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH3' AND HIVE_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH4' AND HIVE_VERSION!='MAPR2' AND HIVE_VERSION!='APACHE_1_0_0' AND HIVE_VERSION!='HDP_1_0' AND HIVE_VERSION!='PIVOTAL_HD_1_0_1')
